text_logic_form: The point $P$ is the centroid of triangle $XYZ$.
The length of the line $KP$ is $3$.
The length of the line $XJ$ is $8$.
Find the length of the line $YJ$.

Find the length of the line $YJ$.
diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $XJ$ is $8$.
The point $K$ lies on the line $ZY$.
The point $P$ lies on the line $ZJ$.
The point $J$ lies on the line $YX$.
The point $P$ lies on the line $YL$.
The point $P$ lies on the line $XK$.
line_instances: There are lines $PJ$, $PK$, $PL$, forming a triangle $PKL$.
There are lines $XJ$, $XK$, $XL$, forming a triangle $XKL$.
There are lines $XP$, $YP$, $ZP$, forming a triangle $XPYPZ$.
